Summary: Stationary object (blue/violet/white/yellow colours) oscillating on itself with smaller satellites flashing blue. Suddenly vanished.
divs: Sighting DetailsThe object was stationary but it seemed to oscillate on itself. It sometimes ascended or descended, grew bigger (came closer?). All around, small other blues lights were flashing, stationary. Then, the main object changed direction, waved like a leaf and suddenly vanished.
